Credit Card Payment Receipt:

=======================================================================
Credit Card Payment Receipt
=======================================================================

Dear <%NameOnCard%>:

We have successfully processed your payment.

As you authorized by phone, we are confirming that we have charged your credit card as follows:

Date: <%LocalDateTime%>
Customer ID:
Transaction ID: <%ReferenceNumber%>
Amount: $<%Amount%>
Account: <%CardType%>, ending in <%ProtectedPaymentNumber%>
Invoice #: <%InvoiceNumber%>
Description:

We have your billing address on file as:
<%NameOnCard%>
<%BillingAddress%>
<%ZipCode%>

If any of the above information is incorrect, please contact us at <%MerchantPhone%>
Thank you for your payment.

Sincerely,
<%MerchantName%>
<%MerchantAddress1%> <%MerchantAddress2%>
<%MerchantCity%> <%MerchantState%> <%MerchantZipCode%>
<%MerchantPhone%>

This office has been hired as a debt collector. If you are a consumer with an account placed in our office for collections then this is an attempt
to collect a debt and any information will be used for that purspose.

]]>\r \r \r PaySimple\CreditCardRefundReceipt.htm\r 2\r CreditCardRefund\r Credit Card Refund Receipt
Credit Card Refund Receipt:

=======================================================================
Credit Card Refund Receipt
=======================================================================

Dear <%NameOnCard%>:

We are confirming that you have been issued a refund as indicated below:

Date: <%LocalDateTime%>
Credit Transaction ID: <%ReferenceNumber%>
Refund For: Transaction ID #<%OriginalReferenceNumber%>
Amount: $<%Amount%>
Account: <%CardType%>, ending in <%ProtectedPaymentNumber%>
Customer ID:

If you believe any of the information above is incorrect, please contact us at <%MerchantPhone%> or <%MerchantEmail%>.

Thank you.

Sincerely,
<%MerchantName%>
<%MerchantAddress1%> <%MerchantAddress2%>
<%MerchantCity%> <%MerchantState%> <%MerchantZipCode%>
<%MerchantPhone%>

This office has been hired as a debt collector. If you are a consumer with an account placed in our office for collections then this is an attempt
to collect a debt and any information will be used for that purspose.

]]>\r \r \r PaySimple\Receipt-ACHPaymentTelephone.htm\r 3\r ACH-Telephone\r \r \r \r PaySimple\Receipt-ACHPayment-WEB.htm\r 4\r ACH-WEB\r \r \r \r PaySimple\Receipt–RecurringPaymentPlan.htm\r 5\r RecurringPlan\r \r \r \r PaySimple\Receipt–ScheduledOne-timePayment.htm\r 6\r ScheduledOne-time\r \r \r \r PaySimple\Receipt–ScheduledPayment.htm\r 7\r ScheduledPayment\r \r \r \r PaySimple\VoidPaymentNotification.htm\r 8\r VoidNotification\r Void Payment Notification
Void Payment Notification:

=======================================================================
Voided Payment
=======================================================================

Dear <%NameOnCard%>:

As you requested, we have voided payment #<%OriginalReferenceNumber%>. Transaction details are provided below:

Date: <%LocalDateTime%>
Transaction ID: <%ReferenceNumber%>
Transaction Date: <%LocalDateTime%>
Amount: $<%Amount%>
Account: <%BankName%> <%CardType%>, ending in <%ProtectedPaymentNumber%>
Customer ID

If you have any questions, or if you see this payment appear on your account statement, please contact us at <%MerchantPhone%> so that
we can correct the error.

Thank you.

Sincerely,
<%MerchantName%>
<%MerchantAddress1%> <%MerchantAddress2%>
<%MerchantCity%> <%MerchantState%> <%MerchantZipCode%>
<%MerchantPhone%>

This office has been hired as a debt collector. If you are a consumer with an account placed in our office for collections then this is an attempt
to collect a debt and any information will be used for that purspose.

]]>\r \r \r \r 10\r None\r \r \r \r 12722614.html\r 11\r custom\r Credit Card Payment Receipt:

 

=======================================================================
Credit Card Payment Receipt
=======================================================================

 

Dear <%NameOnCard%>:

We have successfully processed your payment.

As you authorized by phone, we are confirming that we have charged your credit card as follows:

 

Date: <%LocalDateTime%>
Transaction ID: <%ReferenceNumber%>
Amount: $<%Amount%>
Account: <%CardType%>, ending in <%CardNumber%>
Invoice #: <%InvoiceNumber%>
Description: <%IsInternetTransaction%>
Result Message <%ResultMessage%>

 

We have your billing address on file as:
 
<%NameOnCard%>
<%BillingAddress%>
<%ZipCode%>

If any of the above information is incorrect, please contact us at <%MerchantPhone%>
Thank you for your payment.

Sincerely,
<%MerchantName%>
<%MerchantAddress1%>
<%MerchantAddress2%>
<%MerchantPhone%>
 

Thank you for your business.

]]>\r \r \r 12722207.tmpl\r 12\r 12722207\r Lexus Stevens Creek Receipt

con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.VirtualTerminal.v6.v4.Common.Requests" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:ProcessCard>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId>\r <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password>\r <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId>\r <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:Amount>${Amount}</acr1:Amount>\r <acr1:AuthorizationNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CardExpirationDate>${CardExpDate}</acr1:CardExpirationDate>\r <acr1:CardLastFourDigits>${=context.expand( '${MagneticData}' ).split( "=" )[0].trim().reverse().take(4).reverse()}</acr1:CardLastFourDigits>\r <acr1:CardNumber>${=context.expand( '${MagneticData}' ).split( "=" )[0].trim()}</acr1:CardNumber>\r <acr1:CardVerificationNumber>${CardCVV}</acr1:CardVerificationNumber>\r <acr1:CardholderVerificationMethod xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CurrencyCode>${CurrencyCode}</acr1:CurrencyCode>\r <acr1:CustomerBillingAddress>${CustomerAddress}</acr1:CustomerBillingAddress>\r <acr1:CustomerCity xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CustomerCode>${CustomerCode}</acr1:CustomerCode>\r <acr1:CustomerEmailAddress>${CustomerEmail}</acr1:CustomerEmailAddress>\r <acr1:CustomerPhone xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CustomerState xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CustomerZipCode>${CustomerZipCode}</acr1:CustomerZipCode>\r <acr1:InvoiceDetail xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:InvoiceNumber>${InvoiceNumber}</acr1:InvoiceNumber>\r <acr1:KeySerialNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:MagneticData xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:NameOnCard>${NameOnCard}</acr1:NameOnCard>\r <acr1:Pin xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:PurchaseOrderNumber>${PONumber}</acr1:PurchaseOrderNumber>\r <acr1:ReferenceNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:SecureCode xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:TerminalCapabilities>Manual</acr1:TerminalCapabilities>\r <acr1:TransactionType>Sale</acr1:TransactionType>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:ProcessCard>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

Credit Card Payment Receipt
=======================================================================

Dear <%NameOnCard%>:

We have successfully processed your payment.

As you authorized by phone, we are confirming that we have charged your credit card as follows:

Date: <%LocalDateTime%>
Customer ID:
Transaction ID: <%ReferenceNumber%>
Amount: $<%Amount%>
Account: <%CardType%>, ending in <%ProtectedPaymentNumber%>
Invoice #: <%InvoiceNumber%>
Description:

We have your billing address on file as:
<%NameOnCard%>
<%BillingAddress%>
<%ZipCode%>

If any of the above information is incorrect, please contact us at <%MerchantPhone%>
Thank you for your payment.

Sincerely,
<%MerchantName%>
<%MerchantAddress1%> <%MerchantAddress2%>
<%MerchantCity%> <%MerchantState%> <%MerchantZipCode%>
<%MerchantPhone%>

This office has been hired as a debt collector. If you are a consumer with an account placed in our office for collections then this is an attempt
to collect a debt and any information will be used for that purspose.

]]>\r \r \r PaySimple\CreditCardRefundReceipt.htm\r 2\r CreditCardRefund\r Credit Card Refund Receipt
Credit Card Refund Receipt:

=======================================================================
Credit Card Refund Receipt
=======================================================================

Dear <%NameOnCard%>:

We are confirming that you have been issued a refund as indicated below:

Date: <%LocalDateTime%>
Credit Transaction ID: <%ReferenceNumber%>
Refund For: Transaction ID #<%OriginalReferenceNumber%>
Amount: $<%Amount%>
Account: <%CardType%>, ending in <%ProtectedPaymentNumber%>
Customer ID:

If you believe any of the information above is incorrect, please contact us at <%MerchantPhone%> or <%MerchantEmail%>.

Thank you.

Sincerely,
<%MerchantName%>
<%MerchantAddress1%> <%MerchantAddress2%>
<%MerchantCity%> <%MerchantState%> <%MerchantZipCode%>
<%MerchantPhone%>

This office has been hired as a debt collector. If you are a consumer with an account placed in our office for collections then this is an attempt
to collect a debt and any information will be used for that purspose.

Void Payment Notification:

=======================================================================
Voided Payment
=======================================================================

Dear <%NameOnCard%>:

As you requested, we have voided payment #<%OriginalReferenceNumber%>. Transaction details are provided below:

Date: <%LocalDateTime%>
Transaction ID: <%ReferenceNumber%>
Transaction Date: <%LocalDateTime%>
Amount: $<%Amount%>
Account: <%BankName%> <%CardType%>, ending in <%ProtectedPaymentNumber%>
Customer ID

If you have any questions, or if you see this payment appear on your account statement, please contact us at <%MerchantPhone%> so that
we can correct the error.

Thank you.

Sincerely,
<%MerchantName%>
<%MerchantAddress1%> <%MerchantAddress2%>
<%MerchantCity%> <%MerchantState%> <%MerchantZipCode%>
<%MerchantPhone%>

This office has been hired as a debt collector. If you are a consumer with an account placed in our office for collections then this is an attempt
to collect a debt and any information will be used for that purspose.

Credit Card Payment Receipt:

=======================================================================
Credit Card Payment Receipt
=======================================================================

Dear <%NameOnCard%>:

We have successfully processed your payment.

As you authorized by phone, we are confirming that we have charged your credit card as follows:

Date: <%LocalDateTime%>
Customer ID:
Transaction ID: <%ReferenceNumber%>
Amount: $<%Amount%>
Account: <%CardType%>, ending in <%ProtectedPaymentNumber%>
Invoice #: <%InvoiceNumber%>
Description:

We have your billing address on file as:
<%NameOnCard%>
<%BillingAddress%>
<%ZipCode%>

If any of the above information is incorrect, please contact us at <%MerchantPhone%>
Thank you for your payment.

Sincerely,
<%MerchantName%>
<%MerchantAddress1%> <%MerchantAddress2%>
<%MerchantCity%> <%MerchantState%> <%MerchantZipCode%>
<%MerchantPhone%>

This office has been hired as a debt collector. If you are a consumer with an account placed in our office for collections then this is an attempt
to collect a debt and any information will be used for that purspose.

]]>\r \r \r PaySimple\CreditCardRefundReceipt.htm\r 2\r CreditCardRefund\r Credit Card Refund Receipt
Credit Card Refund Receipt:

=======================================================================
Credit Card Refund Receipt
=======================================================================

Dear <%NameOnCard%>:

We are confirming that you have been issued a refund as indicated below:

Date: <%LocalDateTime%>
Credit Transaction ID: <%ReferenceNumber%>
Refund For: Transaction ID #<%OriginalReferenceNumber%>
Amount: $<%Amount%>
Account: <%CardType%>, ending in <%ProtectedPaymentNumber%>
Customer ID:

If you believe any of the information above is incorrect, please contact us at <%MerchantPhone%> or <%MerchantEmail%>.

Thank you.

Sincerely,
<%MerchantName%>
<%MerchantAddress1%> <%MerchantAddress2%>
<%MerchantCity%> <%MerchantState%> <%MerchantZipCode%>
<%MerchantPhone%>

This office has been hired as a debt collector. If you are a consumer with an account placed in our office for collections then this is an attempt
to collect a debt and any information will be used for that purspose.

]]>\r \r \r PaySimple\Receipt-ACHPaymentTelephone.htm\r 3\r ACH-Telephone\r \r \r \r PaySimple\Receipt-ACHPayment-WEB.htm\r 4\r ACH-WEB\r \r \r \r PaySimple\Receipt–RecurringPaymentPlan.htm\r 5\r RecurringPlan\r \r \r \r PaySimple\Receipt–ScheduledOne-timePayment.htm\r 6\r ScheduledOne-time\r \r \r \r PaySimple\Receipt–ScheduledPayment.htm\r 7\r ScheduledPayment\r \r \r \r PaySimple\VoidPaymentNotification.htm\r 8\r VoidNotification\r Void Payment Notification
Void Payment Notification:

=======================================================================
Voided Payment
=======================================================================

Dear <%NameOnCard%>:

As you requested, we have voided payment #<%OriginalReferenceNumber%>. Transaction details are provided below:

Date: <%LocalDateTime%>
Transaction ID: <%ReferenceNumber%>
Transaction Date: <%LocalDateTime%>
Amount: $<%Amount%>
Account: <%BankName%> <%CardType%>, ending in <%ProtectedPaymentNumber%>
Customer ID

If you have any questions, or if you see this payment appear on your account statement, please contact us at <%MerchantPhone%> so that
we can correct the error.

Thank you.

Sincerely,
<%MerchantName%>
<%MerchantAddress1%> <%MerchantAddress2%>
<%MerchantCity%> <%MerchantState%> <%MerchantZipCode%>
<%MerchantPhone%>

This office has been hired as a debt collector. If you are a consumer with an account placed in our office for collections then this is an attempt
to collect a debt and any information will be used for that purspose.

]]>\r \r \r \r 10\r None\r \r \r \r 12722614.html\r 11\r custom\r Credit Card Payment Receipt:

 

=======================================================================
Credit Card Payment Receipt
=======================================================================

 

Dear <%NameOnCard%>:

We have successfully processed your payment.

As you authorized by phone, we are confirming that we have charged your credit card as follows:

 

Date: <%LocalDateTime%>
Transaction ID: <%ReferenceNumber%>
Amount: $<%Amount%>
Account: <%CardType%>, ending in <%CardNumber%>
Invoice #: <%InvoiceNumber%>
Description: <%IsInternetTransaction%>
Result Message <%ResultMessage%>

 

We have your billing address on file as:
 
<%NameOnCard%>
<%BillingAddress%>
<%ZipCode%>

If any of the above information is incorrect, please contact us at <%MerchantPhone%>
Thank you for your payment.

Sincerely,
<%MerchantName%>
<%MerchantAddress1%>
<%MerchantAddress2%>
<%MerchantPhone%>
 

Thank you for your business.

con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.VirtualTerminal.v6.v4.Common.Requests" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:ProcessCard>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId>\r <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password>\r <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId>\r <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:Amount>${Amount}</acr1:Amount>\r <acr1:AuthorizationNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CardExpirationDate>${CardExpDate}</acr1:CardExpirationDate>\r <acr1:CardLastFourDigits>${=context.expand( '${MagneticData}' ).split( "=" )[0].trim().reverse().take(4).reverse()}</acr1:CardLastFourDigits>\r <acr1:CardNumber>${=context.expand( '${MagneticData}' ).split( "=" )[0].trim()}</acr1:CardNumber>\r <acr1:CardVerificationNumber>${CardCVV}</acr1:CardVerificationNumber>\r <acr1:CardholderVerificationMethod xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CurrencyCode>${CurrencyCode}</acr1:CurrencyCode>\r <acr1:CustomerBillingAddress>${CustomerAddress}</acr1:CustomerBillingAddress>\r <acr1:CustomerCity xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CustomerCode>${CustomerCode}</acr1:CustomerCode>\r <acr1:CustomerEmailAddress>${CustomerEmail}</acr1:CustomerEmailAddress>\r <acr1:CustomerPhone xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CustomerState xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CustomerZipCode>${CustomerZipCode}</acr1:CustomerZipCode>\r <acr1:InvoiceDetail xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:InvoiceNumber>${InvoiceNumber}</acr1:InvoiceNumber>\r <acr1:KeySerialNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:MagneticData xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:NameOnCard>${NameOnCard}</acr1:NameOnCard>\r <acr1:Pin xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:PurchaseOrderNumber>${PONumber}</acr1:PurchaseOrderNumber>\r <acr1:ReferenceNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:SecureCode xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:TerminalCapabilities>Manual</acr1:TerminalCapabilities>\r <acr1:TransactionType>Sale</acr1:TransactionType>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:ProcessCard>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

As you authorized by phone, we are confirming that we have charged your credit card as follows:

Date: <%LocalDateTime%>
Customer ID:

Description:

<%BillingAddress%>
<%ZipCode%>

Thank you for your payment.

Sincerely,

<%MerchantAddress1%> <%MerchantAddress2%>
<%MerchantCity%> <%MerchantState%> <%MerchantZipCode%>
<%MerchantPhone%>

=======================================================================

Dear <%NameOnCard%>:

As you requested, we have voided payment #<%OriginalReferenceNumber%>. Transaction details are provided below:

Date: <%LocalDateTime%>
Transaction ID: <%ReferenceNumber%>
Transaction Date: <%LocalDateTime%>
Amount: $<%Amount%>
Account: <%BankName%> <%CardType%>, ending in <%ProtectedPaymentNumber%>
Customer ID

If you have any questions, or if you see this payment appear on your account statement, please contact us at <%MerchantPhone%> so that
we can correct the error.

Thank you.

Sincerely,
<%MerchantName%>
<%MerchantAddress1%> <%MerchantAddress2%>
<%MerchantCity%> <%MerchantState%> <%MerchantZipCode%>
<%MerchantPhone%>

This office has been hired as a debt collector. If you are a consumer with an account placed in our office for collections then this is an attempt
to collect a debt and any information will be used for that purspose.

This office has been hired as a debt collector. If you are a consumer with an account placed in our office for collections then this is an attempt
to collect a debt and any information will be used for that purspose.

]]>\r \r \r PaySimple\Receipt-ACHPaymentTelephone.htm\r 3\r ACH-Telephone\r \r \r \r PaySimple\Receipt-ACHPayment-WEB.htm\r 4\r ACH-WEB\r \r \r \r PaySimple\Receipt–RecurringPaymentPlan.htm\r 5\r RecurringPlan\r \r \r \r PaySimple\Receipt–ScheduledOne-timePayment.htm\r 6\r ScheduledOne-time\r \r \r \r PaySimple\Receipt–ScheduledPayment.htm\r 7\r ScheduledPayment\r \r \r \r PaySimple\VoidPaymentNotification.htm\r 8\r VoidNotification\r Void Payment Notification
Void Payment Notification:

=======================================================================
Voided Payment
=======================================================================

Dear <%NameOnCard%>:

As you requested, we have voided payment #<%OriginalReferenceNumber%>. Transaction details are provided below:

Date: <%LocalDateTime%>
Transaction ID: <%ReferenceNumber%>
Transaction Date: <%LocalDateTime%>
Amount: $<%Amount%>
Account: <%BankName%> <%CardType%>, ending in <%ProtectedPaymentNumber%>
Customer ID

If you have any questions, or if you see this payment appear on your account statement, please contact us at <%MerchantPhone%> so that
we can correct the error.

Thank you.

Sincerely,
<%MerchantName%>
<%MerchantAddress1%> <%MerchantAddress2%>
<%MerchantCity%> <%MerchantState%> <%MerchantZipCode%>
<%MerchantPhone%>

This office has been hired as a debt collector. If you are a consumer with an account placed in our office for collections then this is an attempt
to collect a debt and any information will be used for that purspose.

]]>\r \r \r \r 10\r None\r \r \r \r 12722614.html\r 11\r custom\r Credit Card Payment Receipt:

 

=======================================================================
Credit Card Payment Receipt
=======================================================================

 

Dear <%NameOnCard%>:

We have successfully processed your payment.

As you authorized by phone, we are confirming that we have charged your credit card as follows:

 

Date: <%LocalDateTime%>
Transaction ID: <%ReferenceNumber%>
Amount: $<%Amount%>
Account: <%CardType%>, ending in <%CardNumber%>
Invoice #: <%InvoiceNumber%>
Description: <%IsInternetTransaction%>
Result Message <%ResultMessage%>

 

We have your billing address on file as:
 
<%NameOnCard%>
<%BillingAddress%>
<%ZipCode%>

If any of the above information is incorrect, please contact us at <%MerchantPhone%>
Thank you for your payment.

Sincerely,
<%MerchantName%>
<%MerchantAddress1%>
<%MerchantAddress2%>
<%MerchantPhone%>
 

Thank you for your business.
